confirm_dialog.refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh the exam? Current time and answers will be lost.
confirm_dialog.finish: Are you sure you want to finish the exam? Time is not finished and you will not be able to come back.
confirm_dialog.repeat: Are you sure you want to repeat the exam? Current answers will be lost and you will not be able to see this result again.
confirm_dialog.exit: Are you sure you want to exit? Current time and answers will be lost.

paragraphs.first: This site has been done to help UniTN first-year computer-science students to prepare for the theoric part of Programming Languages - module 1's exam.
